name: Atlas Swings
description:
CLANGGG!!!

A thunderous thud rings through Rockefeller Square and New York City. Atlas, the statue who holds it all together, has lost the globe again. With a lamp post by his side, time for sad-dad-statue's favorite Sunday morning activity: golfing the globe back to its place... and he better move fast before the city awakes again! Use A/D and Left/Right to aim, and W/Space to charge and release the globe. M to toggle the map, and ESC to pause the game. 

Download the game for Windows and MacOS below.

Atlas Swings is a one-month project for the Geopipe NYC Game Jam using provided assets.
January 2023
